entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023
